title: Strands of Time and Magic: An Epic Fantasy Adventure
description: Magic is dangerous. Being a charmer is…Deadly. And Brylee knows it. She conceals her abilities but lives in fear of exposure. Then, forced to protect herself and a suitor pressed upon her by her parents, her worst fear materialises.She falls straight into the hands of a mage who understands exactly what she is and who recognises her exceptional abilities. He offers salvation for all her problems. His price? A deadly mission – she must hunt down the Red Assassin.On the track of her quarry, Brylee is flung back through the currents of time – a dangerous event. Yet one that gives her an opportunity to better prepare herself and build her strength. She needs both. For a maelstrom of forces soon swirl around her to produce a surprise she could never imagine in her wildest dreams.And her world will never be the same…A standalone novel, Strands of Time and Magic delivers a complete story. The sequel is coming soon!
author: Andrew Platten
